Verses: 1 sagodharare, Isravelar Ratchikkappadavendum Enbadhe En Irudhayaththin Viruppamum Naan Dhevanai Nokkichseyyum Vinnappamumaayirukkiradhu.
2 dhevanaippatri Avargalukku Vairaakkiyamundendru Avargalaik Kuriththuch Saatchisollugiren; Aagilum Adhu Arivukketra Vairaakkiyamalla.
3 eppadiyendraal, Avargal Dhevaneedhiyai Ariyaamal, Thangal Suyaneedhiyai Nilainiruththath Thedugirapadiyaal Dhevaneedhikkuk Keezhppadiyaadhirukkiraargal.
4 visuvaasikkira Evanukkum Needhi Undaagumpadiyaagak Kiristhu Niyaayappiramaanaththin Mudivaayirukkiraar.
5 mose Niyaayappiramaanaththinaalaagum Needhiyaikkuriththu: Ivaigalaich Seygira Manushan Ivaigalaal Pizhaippaan Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiraan.
6 visuvaasaththinaalaagum Needhiyaanadhu: Kiristhuvai Irangivarappannumpadi Paralogaththukku Erugiravan Yaar?
7 alladhu Kiristhuvai Mariththorilirundhu Erivarappannumpadi Paadhaalaththukku Irangugiravan Yaar? Endru Un Ullaththile Sollaadhiruppaayaaga Endru Sollugiradhumandri;
8 indha Vaarththai Unakkuch Sameebamaai Un Vaayilum Un Irudhayaththilum Irukkiradhu Endrum Sollugiradhu; Indha Vaarththai Naangal Pirasangikkira Visuvaasaththin Vaarththaiye.
9 ennavendraal, Karththaraagiya Yesuvai Nee Un Vaayinaale Arikkaiyittu, Dhevan Avarai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinaarendru Un Irudhayaththile Visuvaasiththaal Ratchikkappaduvaai.
10 needhiyundaaga Irudhayaththile Visuvaasikkappadum, Iratchippundaaga Vaayinaale Arikkaipannappadum.
11 avarai Visuvaasikkiravan Evano Avan Vetkappaduvadhillaiyendru Vedham Sollugiradhu.
12 yoodhanendrum Girekkanendrum Viththiyaasame Illai; Ellaarukkung Karththaraanavar Thammaith Thozhudhukollugira Yaavarukkum Aisuvariyasambannaraayirukkiraar.
13 aadhalaal Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollugira Evanum Ratchikkappaduvaan.
14 avarai Visuvaasiyaadhavagal Eppadi Avaraith Thozhudhukolluvaargal? Avaraikkuriththuk Kelvippadaadhavargal Eppadi Visuvaasippaargal? Pirasangikkiravan Illaavittaal Eppadik Kelvippaduvaargal?
15 anuppappadaavittaal Eppadip Pirasangippaargal? Samaadhaanaththaikkoori, Narkaariyangalaich Suviseshamaai Arivikkiravargaludaiya Paadhangal Evvalavu Azhagaanavaigal Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.
16 aanaalum Suviseshaththukku Ellaarum Keezhppadiyavillai. Adhaikkuriththu Esaayaa: Karththaave, Engal Moolamaaik Kelvippattadhai Visuvaasiththavan Yaar Endru Sollugiraan.
17 aadhalaal Visuvaasam Kelviyinaale Varum, Kelvi Dhevanudaiya Vasanaththinaale Varum.
18 ippadiyirukka, Avargal Kelvippadavillaiyaa Endru Ketkiren; Kelvippattaargal; Avaigalin Saththam Boomiyengum Avaigalin Vasanangal Poochchakkaraththuk Kadaisivaraikkum Sellugiradhe.

19 isravelar Adhai Ariyavillaiyaa Endru Ketkiren, Arindhaargal. Mudhalaavadhu, Mose: Enakku Janangalallaadhavargalaikkondu Naan Ungalukku Erichchal Undaakkuven; Buththiyeenamulla Janangalaale Ungalukkuk Kobamoottuven Endraan.
20 allaamalum Esaayaa: Ennaith Thedaadhavargalaale Kandariyappatten, Ennai Visaariththuk Kelaadhavargalukku Veliyarangamaanen Endru Dhairiyankondu Sollugiraan.
21 isravelaraik Kuriththo: Keezhppadiyaadhavargalum Edhirththup Pesugiravargalumaayirukkira Janangalidaththirku Naalmuzhudhum En Kaigalai Neettinen Endru Avan Solliyirukkiraan.
